name: Stephan Wells
subtitle: Developer at EPAM
quote: I am writing a long sentence right now to see if the testimonial will get larger and larger as the content gets longer and longer and I'm not sure if it will actually work

name: Pierre Bonis
subtitle: Senior Games Programmer at Meta
quote: Working with Stephan was always such a great pleasure. His minute attention to detail and love of clean, well-documented code made for one of the smoothest collaborative experiences I've had in a community project. He's organ-ised, focused but knows how to improvise and compromise. Oh, and he's also friendly, knowledge-able and approachable. The whole package!

name: Irene Emory
subtitle: Lead Business Analyst at EPAM
quote: I cannot express enough how the project and team benefit from having Stephan working with us. He seems to genuinely care about the quality of the product. I don't remember his scope of work ever causing any major or medium bugs, only minor ones or none at all. He has great organizational and explanatory skills. His general demeanor uplifts the team spirit.
